body_html: I've reenabled support for variadic templates on Tegra-X1 provided that one uses JetPack 2.3 (in previous versions nvcc crashes when compiling some of the variadic templates). I haven't tried yet to compile TensorFlow itself but this should reduce the number of code changes necessary to work around the lack of IndexList on Tegra.
body_text: I've reenabled support for variadic templates on Tegra-X1 provided that one uses JetPack 2.3 (in previous versions nvcc crashes when compiling some of the variadic templates). body: I've reenabled support for variadic templates on Tegra-X1 provided that one uses JetPack 2.3 (in previous versions nvcc crashes when compiling some of the variadic templates). I haven't tried yet to compile TensorFlow itself but this should reduce the number of code changes necessary to work around the lack of IndexList on Tegra.
